weightChart.badData: Unfortunately, the measurement contains erroneous data.

ecgAnalysis.min_proba: Based on the sample, the risk is at least
ecgAnalysis.severe_bradycardia:
Severe bradycardia! (Low heart rate.)
  • Checkup is recommended!
    • If you do not feel well, seek help immediately (family member, GP, physician on-call)!
  • 24-hour Holter ECG and 12-lead ECG is recommended, consult with a cardiologist.
  • Symptomatic bradycardia may require the implantation of a pacemaker.
ecgAnalysis.bradycardia:
Bradycardia detected! (Heart rate lower than normal.)
  • Checkup is recommended!
  • The accurate evaluation of the heart rate depends on the time of the day, your current physical condition and mental state.
  • We recommend logging your heart rate. If symptoms arise, consult with your doctor about starting or adjusting medication.
ecgAnalysis.normal:
Your heart rate is in the normal range.
  • The accurate evaluation of the heart rate depends on the time of the day, your current physical condition and mental state.
ecgAnalysis.normal_upper:
Your heart rate is at the higher end of the normal range.
  • The accurate evaluation of the heart rate depends on the time of the day, your current physical condition and mental state.
ecgAnalysis.tachycardia:
Tachycardia detected! (High heart rate.)
  • Checkup is recommended!
  • The accurate evaluation of the heart rate depends on the time of the day, your current physical condition and mental state.
  • We recommend logging your heart rate. If symptoms arise, consult with your doctor about starting or adjusting medication.
ecgAnalysis.severe_tachycardia:
Severe tachycardia! (Critically high heart rate.)
  • Checkup is recommended!
  • The accurate evaluation of the heart rate depends on the time of the day, your current physical condition and mental state.
  • We recommend logging your heart rate. If symptoms arise, consult with your doctor about starting or adjusting medication.
  • If you do not feel well, seek help immediately (family member, GP, physician on-call)!
ecgAnalysis.too_short: The measurement is too short. Please measure for at least 1 minute.
ecgAnalysis.all_invalid: The measurement could not be evaluated. Please retry.
ecgAnalysis.noisy_signal: too much noise, artefacts, or improperly worn ECG belt

patients.sureToChangeEesztUploadStatusToYesYes:
From now on, all evaluations and anamnesis under your medical seal number and Institution ID will be uploaded to the EESZT system. To upload, you must log in to the EESZT with a mobile token. 

Are you sure you want to turn it on?
patients.sureToChangeEesztUploadStatusToYesNo:
From now on, all evaluations and anamnesis under your medical seal number and Institution ID will be uploaded to the EESZT system. Activating will also enable uploading to EESZT in your Profile. To upload, you must log in to the EESZT with a mobile token. 

Are you sure you want to turn it on?
patients.sureToChangeEesztUploadStatusToNo:
If you want to turn it off, the documents that you have not uploaded so far and the documents created after that will not be uploaded to the EESZT system! 

Are you sure you want to turn it off?

Notification and Information Emails Sent!

From now on, after selecting the Patient, you can follow the Patient's measurements under the 'Measurements' menu item, on which you can make evaluations and request a specialist consultation.

Notification and Information Emails Sent!
